tutorials.title: Tutorials
tutorials.heading: Mrs. Pokebattler is here to guide you through using the Pokebattler Raid Party App
tutorials.description: My husband sometimes forgets to write instructions on how to use his tools. I always have to remind him that people need a bit of guidance some times! Here are some guides for the more complicated parts of the Pokebattler Raid Party app!
tutorials.caution: These tutorials are heavy on the visuals and are a few megabytes in size, consider loading on wifi.

joinRaid.title: Join Raids
joinRaid.subtitle: Learn how to join raids in the Pokebattler Raid Party app
joinRaid.heading: TLDR: Mrs. Pokebattler will show you how to join a raid

joinRaidAndroid.title: Join Raids
joinRaidAndroid.subtitle: Learn how to join raids in the Pokebattler Raid Party app

hostRaid.subtitle: Learn how to host raids in the Pokebattler Raid Party app

hostRaidAndroid.title: Host Raids

copyPaste.title: How to Paste
copyPaste.heading: Not sure how to copy & paste on your phone? Mrs. Pokebattler has a quick guide for you!
copyPaste.subtitle: Learn how to paste a friend code in the Pokebattler Raid Party app
